name: 3D Goat Rampage - Zoo Animal Wild Safari
name_original: 3D Goat Rampage - Zoo Animal Wild Safari
description:
You have escaped from the zoo and on the RUN!

Do as MUCH damage on your escape! The zoo keepers will be trying to catch you!

Play as a lion, pig or goat to cause as much destruction as possible! Enjoy the freedom of running wild!

DOWNLOAD AND RAMPAGE TODAY!
